description:
Princess Su Yi of the Heavenly Realm befriended Sun Wukong in the mortal world and fell in love with him. But Wukong was violently treated as a mortal demon by the other heavenly gods and suppressed under the Five Finger Mountain. For three hundred years, the Great God Rudrai used his actions to convert Wukong and teach him how to stand up for what is right in his heart. Sun Wukong protects Tang Sanzang and goes to the other side of the world to retrieve the Flame of Creation for the benefit of the world. After all the twists and turns, he finally returns, only to find that a great conspiracy has surfaced and the fate of the Master and his disciples has been rewritten.
source: bangumi/DeepL
Prequel to the Xixing Ji series.
